data.lyric:
[ti:Bout My Business(feat. Sherhonda Gaulden) (Explicit)]
[ar:Youngboy Never Broke Again/Sherhonda Gaulden]
[al:38 Baby 2 (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Bout My Business (feat. Sherhonda Gaulden) (Explicit) - Youngboy Never Broke Again/Sherhonda Gaulden
[00:01.42]Lyrics by：Kentrell Gaulden/Sherhonda Gaulden/David Boonpetch
[00:02.85]YoungBoy Never Broke Again：
[00:03.73]Hello
[00:05.55]Pawpaw
[00:07.10]Huh
[00:08.22]Whatchu doin'
[00:10.34]I'm just tryna watch TV TV watchin' me
[00:14.11]Haha whole lotta nothin'
[00:16.24]I miss you
[00:17.91]I miss you too man
[00:19.91]Aren't you supposed to be comin' to
[00:21.35]Um Southern for a concert now
[00:24.13]Yeah I'll see you there
[00:25.38]I'ma be there when is it
[00:27.06]On the twenty-eighth or twenty-sixth
[00:28.91]It's one of them days I'ma make sure you know
[00:31.05]I love you though I was tryna make sure I talk to you
[00:34.70]Okay I'm glad you called man glad you called
[00:37.72]I love you Pawpaw
[00:39.48]I love you too
[00:40.73]Slime
[00:41.91]Alright man
[00:46.69]Ooh ah
[00:49.14]Ooh ah
[00:53.00]I just bought a brand-new bezel
[00:55.74]For to make the hard times look pretty
[00:58.75]And I came up straight up from the block
[01:01.80]I watched my grandpa save pennies
[01:04.68]I wish my grandma was right here standin' on side of me
[01:07.67]Had to go through sad times to get it
[01:11.48]And I know my son's gon' be aight we all gon' be aight
[01:14.07]'Cause I came 'bout my business
[01:16.77]Let go my past I'm movin' on
[01:18.37]Everything new ain't nothin' old
[01:19.82]Put in just way too many costs
[01:21.36]And I just bought myself a home
[01:22.73]I still can't think why anybody would just leave me
[01:25.59]Pistol sparkin' tryna just leave pussies out where I see
[01:28.58]How the f**k you want me but you hide me
[01:30.98]I'ma head home 'cause now you way up out a molly
[01:34.08]Would get you tatted so just like her
[01:35.55]You'll stand on side me
[01:36.98]Dreams through the storm
[01:37.99]I hope a smile always what kind see
[01:40.02]Feel to see your greatness once they blind me
[01:42.11]And that n***a must ain't poppin' it off
[01:43.80]You talkin' that s**t on Twitter
[01:45.15]I'ma stay my dog a*s in my ways steady screamin'
[01:47.43]F**k a n***a
[01:48.30]My mama cars ain't never had AC ever since I was little
[01:51.28]Thank God every car
[01:52.08]I got in my pocket hold at least one million
[01:52.98]I just bought a brand-new bezel
[01:55.74]For to make the hard times look pretty
[01:58.76]And I came up straight up from the block
[02:01.66]I watched my grandpa save pennies
[02:04.68]I wish my grandma was right here standin' on side of me
[02:07.72]Had to go through sad times to get it
[02:11.48]And I know my son's gon' be aight we all gon' be aight
[02:14.10]'Cause I came 'bout my business
[02:16.23]Sherhonda Gaulden：
[02:17.61]You see I'm always with Kentrell
[02:19.15]But I rep behind the scenes
[02:20.80]I love my baby boy he the wind beneath my wings
[02:23.76]CT Lee and lil' Kendell man he give them anything
[02:26.69]See your star up in the sky
[02:28.13]But see our star she on our team
[02:29.90]I'm sleepin' through the day because I'm livin' out my dream
[02:32.68]And my mama on his side she the angel on the scene
[02:35.84]He goin' to the top because he win by any means
[02:38.89]He married to this s**t
[02:40.21]He bought hisself a wedding ring
[02:40.70]YoungBoy Never Broke Again：
[02:40.94]I just bought a brand-new bezel
[02:43.63]For to make the hard times look pretty
[02:46.70]And I came up straight up from the block
[02:49.72]I watched my grandpa save pennies
[02:52.78]I wish my grandma was right here standin' on side of me
[02:55.68]Had to go through sad times to get it
[02:59.52]And I know my son's gon' be aight we all gon' be aight
[03:02.08]'Cause I came 'bout my business
data.trans:
[ti:Bout My Business(feat. Sherhonda Gaulden) (Explicit)]
[ar:Youngboy Never Broke Again/Sherhonda Gaulden]
[al:38 Baby 2 (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.42]//
[00:02.85]//
[00:03.73]哈喽
[00:05.55]爷爷
[00:07.10]哈
[00:08.22]你在干啥
[00:10.34]我想看电视来着 结果电视在看我
[00:14.11]哈哈 也没干啥
[00:16.24]我想你
[00:17.91]我也想你呀
[00:19.91]你最近是要来南方
[00:21.35]办演唱会 对吧
[00:24.13]对 我们到时候见
[00:25.38]我会去看的 什么时候来着
[00:27.06]二十八号还是二十六号
[00:28.91]就那几天吧 确定了我会告诉你的
[00:31.05]我爱你 我只是想跟你说说话
[00:34.70]嗯嗯 好 我很高兴你打电话来
[00:37.72]我爱你 爷爷
[00:39.48]我也爱你
[00:40.73]那先就这样吧
[00:41.91]嗯嗯 好的
[00:46.69]//
[00:49.14]//
[00:53.00]我刚买了一块新手表
[00:55.74]让那些艰难时刻看起来美好一点
[00:58.75]我从街头混出了头
[01:01.80]我曾看着我的爷爷省吃俭用
[01:04.68]真希望我的奶奶现在就站在我的身边
[01:07.67]只有经历了悲伤才会明白这些道理
[01:11.48]我知道我的儿子会好好的 我们都会好好的
[01:14.07]因为我在努力工作挣钱养家
[01:16.77]放下我的过去 我要向前看
[01:18.37]用的东西都是新的 没有老旧的东西
[01:19.82]付出了太多代价
[01:21.36]我刚买了一套房子
[01:22.73]我还是想不明白 为什么有人会离开我
[01:25.59]手枪砰砰响 想要除掉我看到的那些混蛋
[01:28.58]你明明想要我 怎么又把我藏起来
[01:30.98]我要回家了 因为你吃了那种玩意儿 神经发作了
[01:34.08]带你去纹身 就像她一样
[01:35.55]你会站在我的身旁
[01:36.98]穿越狂风暴雨 追逐梦想
[01:37.99]我希望总能看到灿烂的笑容
[01:40.02]每当他们蒙蔽我的双眼 我都感觉看到了你的好
[01:42.11]那个家伙肯定没什么本事
[01:43.80]你总是在网上吹牛说大话
[01:45.15]我会始终坚持做我自己 大声叫道
[01:47.43]去你的吧
[01:48.30]从我小时候开始 我妈妈的车就一直都没有空调
[01:51.28]感谢上帝 现在我每辆车都有空调了
[01:52.08]我的兜里装了至少一百万
[01:52.98]我刚买了一块新手表
[01:55.74]让那些艰难时刻看起来美好一点
[01:58.76]我从街头混出了头
[02:01.66]我曾看着我的爷爷省吃俭用
[02:04.68]真希望我的奶奶现在就站在我的身边
[02:07.72]只有经历了悲伤才会明白这些道理
[02:11.48]我知道我的儿子会好好的 我们都会好好的
[02:14.10]因为我在努力工作挣钱养家
[02:16.23]//
[02:17.61]你看 我始终支持Kentrell
[02:19.15]但我在幕后工作
[02:20.80]我爱我的宝贝儿子 他是我羽翼下的微风
[02:23.76]CT Lee和Kendell 朋友 他什么都愿意给他们
[02:26.69]看 你的星星挂上了天空
[02:28.13]但是我们的星星 她在我们的团队中
[02:29.90]我白天都在睡觉 因为我过着梦想的生活
[02:32.68]我的妈妈站在他那边 她就像天使一样
[02:35.84]他会登上巅峰 因为他会不择手段取得胜利
[02:38.89]他将一生奉献给这份事业
[02:40.21]他给自己买了一枚婚戒
[02:40.70]//
[02:40.94]我刚买了一块新手表
[02:43.63]让那些艰难时刻看起来美好一点
[02:46.70]我从街头混出了头
[02:49.72]我曾看着我的爷爷省吃俭用
[02:52.78]真希望我的奶奶现在就站在我的身边
[02:55.68]只有经历了悲伤才会明白这些道理
[02:59.52]我知道我的儿子会好好的 我们都会好好的
[03:02.08]因为我在努力工作挣钱养家
